name: Earthbound Tumblr File Select +Enemy Option bar
description: A style based off the file select screen of Earthbound. Text, Video, Sound, ext. buttons changed to be Boss icons that move while highlighted. Uses enemies from the same stylish as https://userstyles.org/styles/91486/earthbound-enemies-1-tumblr-post-icons with some detail edits
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.tumblr.com"), url-prefix("https://www.tumblr.com") { Body{background: url('https://41.media.tumblr.com/382c6fd448a4f0b8645aa23c983c4197/tumblr_nvbmzmJ1BG1rsaua4o1_1280.png') center #000000 repeat fixed !important; } a.new_post_label > i { height: 90px; } .new_post .new_post_label/*_icon*/ > I { background: url('http://i.imgur.com/FFbLOUy.png') no-repeat !important; z-index: -1; } .new_post .new_post_label {padding: 74px 1px 5px 0 !important} .new_post_label > I { color: transparent !important; transition: background-position .08s linear !important; } #new_post_label_text > I {background-position: 2px -5px !important} #new_post_label_photo > I {background-position: -73px -5px !important} #new_post_label_quote > I {background-position: -148px -5px !important} #new_post_label_link > I {background-position: -223px -5px !important} #new_post_label_chat > I {background-position: -298px -5px !important} #new_post_label_audio > I {background-position: -373px -5px !important} #new_post_label_video > I {background-position: -448px -5px !important} #new_post_label_text:hover > I {background-position: 2px -9px !important} #new_post_label_photo:hover > I {background-position: -73px -9px !important} #new_post_label_quote:hover > I {background-position: -148px -9px !important} #new_post_label_link:hover > I {background-position: -223px -9px !important} #new_post_label_chat:hover > I {background-position: -298px -9px !important} #new_post_label_audio:hover > I {background-position: -373px -9px !important} #new_post_label_video:hover > I {background-position: -448px -9px !important} #new_post_label_text:active > I {background-position: 2px -5px !important} #new_post_label_photo:active > I {background-position: -73px -5px !important} #new_post_label_quote:active > I {background-position: -148px -5px !important} #new_post_label_link:active > I {background-position: -223px -5px !important} #new_post_label_chat:active > I {background-position: -298px -5px !important} #new_post_label_audio:active > I {background-position: -373px -5px !important} #new_post_label_video:active > I {background-position: -448px -5px !important} ol#posts li blockquote, body.mceContentBody blockquote { margin-left: 0 !important; margin-right: 0 !important; padding-left: 10px !important; border-width: 4px !important; border-color: #a8bccf !important; } ol#posts li blockquote blockquote, body.mceContentBody blockquote blockquote { border-color: #839aaf !important; } ol#posts li blockquote blockquote blockquote, body.mceContentBody blockquote blockquote blockquote { border-color: #6b7d8f !important; } ol#posts li blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote, body.mceContentBody blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote { border-color: #4c5e6f !important; } ol#posts li blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote, body.mceContentBody blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote { border-color: #36434f !important; } #dashboard_index #left_column, #right_column {background-color: transparent !important;} div.l-content.l-content.l-content { background: rgba(0,60,100,0.5) !important; } #left_column, #right_column {background-color: transparent !important;} div.l-content.l-content.l-content { background: rgba(0, 60, 100, 0.5) !important; -webkit-border-radius: 20px; -moz-border-radius: 20px; border-radius: 20px; margin: auto; padding: 20px 20px; } h1 { color: #666666; text-shadow: 0 0 3px #ffffff; } .no_posts_found, h1.dashboard_header { color: #666666; } img#content_top, img#content_bottom { display: none; } #right_column a#dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current #dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_current { background: none; } #right_column .dashboard_nav_item { background: none; background-attachment: initial; background-position-x: 50%; background-position-y: 100%; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; } #right_column .dashboard_nav_item #hide_radar { background-image: none; background-repeat-x: no-repeat; background-repeat-y: repeat; background-attachment: initial; background-position-x: 0%; background-position-y: 0%; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: transparent; } #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_controls_radar_media.photo, #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_controls_radar_media.photoset, #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_controls_radar_media.video { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); } #nav .nav_item.active { background: rgba(0,60,100,0.5) !important; } #nav .nav_item .nav_item_nipple .nav_item_nipple_pixel { background: rgba(0,60,100,0.5) !important; } ol#posts li.notification.alt { background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); } ol#posts li.notification.first_notification { background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.8); } ol#posts li.notification { background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.8); border-bottom: 1px solid #000000; } ol#posts li.notification.last_notification { border-bottom: 1px solid #000000; } ol#posts li.post .permalink { background: rgba(50,0,0,0.9); } #right_column .dashboard_nav_item #dashboard_controls_suggested_blogs { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.8); border: solid #000000; } ol#posts li.post .post_avatar{ border-bottom: 0px solid #0A2939; } #right_column .dashboard_nav_item #dashboard_controls_suggested_blogs .dashboard_controls_suggested_blog { border-top: 1px solid #000000; border-bottom: 1px solid #000000; } #right_column a#dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current:hover { background: none; } #right_column a#dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current:hover #dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_current { background: none; } form.dashboard_options_form { background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7); border-bottom: 1px solid #000000; border-bottom-left-radius: 10px 10px; border-bottom-left-radius: 10px 10px; border-bottom-right-radius: 10px 10px; border-bottom-right-radius: 10px 10px; border-top-left-radius: 10px 10px; border-top-left-radius: 10px 10px; border-top-right-radius: 10px 10px; border-top-right-radius: 10px 10px; color: #cccccc; display: block; font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 15px 22px; } form.dashboard_options_form .option_container { border-top: 1px solid #000000; } .no_posts_found, h1.dashboard_header { color: #666666; }.new_post { background: #ffffff url('http://i.imgur.com/0MvaQtj.png') center center no-repeat !important; } .new_post_label_icon { background-image: none !important; } /* Code repaired by admin. See http://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/37591/attempting-to-mass-fix-broken-tumblr-dash-icon-styles */ /* i really want this to be global */ }
